00035 /*
00036  * checks whether a file does exist
00037  * @param filename
00038  * @return bool true or false
00039  */
00040 bool DoesFileExist( char *filename ) {
00041   bool flag = false;
00042   std::fstream fin( filename, std::ios::in );
00043   if ( fin.is_open() )
00044     flag = true;
00045   fin.close();
00046   return flag;
00047 }

00055 printMinMaxValues(){

00057   std::cout << "Minimum value for bool: " << std::numeric_limits<bool>::min() << std::endl;
00058   std::cout << "Maximum value for bool: " << std::numeric_limits<bool>::max() << std::endl;
00059   std::cout << "bool is signed: " << std::numeric_limits<bool>::is_signed << std::endl;
00060   std::cout << "Non-sign bits in bool: " << std::numeric_limits<bool>::digits << std::endl;

00106 /*
00107  * write a given string, without newline
00108  * @param text: this string
00109  */
00110 void write(std::string text){
00111   std::cout << text;
00112   std::cout << std::flush;
00113 }

00115 /* \brief output a comment on a new line */
00116 /* Write a string onto a line on std::out and add a newline
00117  * @param text: comment to be printed
00118  */
00119 void writeln(std::string text){
00120   std::cout << text << std::endl;
00121   std::cout << std::flush;
00122 }

00124 /* 
00125  * Write "done" without newline
00126  */
00127 void writedone(void){
00128   std::cout << "done!";
00129   std::cout << std::flush;
00130 }
00131 
00132 /*
00133  * Write "done" with newline
00134  */
00135 void writelndone(void){
00136   std::cout << "done!" << std::endl;
00137   std::cout << std::flush;
00138 }

00140 /*
00141  * Write "done!" if DebugLevel activated
00142  */
00143 void donedebug(bool DebugLevelActivated){
00144   if(DebugLevelActivated)
00145     writelndone();
00146 }

00148 /*
00149  * Write a string onto a line on std::cout,
00150  * given that the first argument is true
00151  * @param DebugLevelActivated: boolean value determining output funcionality
00152  * @param text: std::string of desired output
00153  */
00154 void writedebug(bool DebugLevelActivated, std::string text){
00155   if(DebugLevelActivated)
00156     write(text);
00157 }

00159 /* \brief output a debug comment on std out */
00160 /* Write a string onto a line on std::out and add a newline,
00161  * given that the first argument is true.
00162  * @param DebugLevelActivated: boolean value determining output functionality
00163  * @param text: std::string of desired output
00164  */
00165 void writelndebug(bool DebugLevelActivated, std::string text){
00166   if(DebugLevelActivated)
00167     writeln(text);
00168 }

00178 /* @brief Count the lines of a textfile */
00184 unsigned GetLineNumber(std::string filename){
00185   std::ifstream infile(filename.c_str());
00186   if(!infile)
00187     return 0;
00188   unsigned i = 0;
00189   std::string sd;
00190   while(getline(infile,sd) && sd.size()>0)
00191     ++i;
00192 
00193   infile.close();
00194   return i;
00195 }
00196 
00197 /* @brief Reverse a string */
00203 void reverse(char s[])
00204 {
00205   int c, i, j;
00206 
00207   for (i = 0, j = strlen(s)-1; i<j; i++, j--) {
00208     c = s[i];
00209     s[i] = s[j];
00210     s[j] = c;
00211   }
00212 }
00213 
00214 /* \brief Conversion int -> char[] */
00221 void itoa(int n, char s[])
00222 {
00223   int i, sign;
00224 
00225   if ((sign = n) < 0)  /* record sign */
00226     n = -n;          /* make n positive */
00227   i = 0;
00228   do {       /* generate digits in reverse order */
00229     s[i++] = n % 10 + '0';   /* get next digit */
00230   } while ((n /= 10) > 0);     /* delete it */
00231   if (sign < 0)
00232     s[i++] = '-';
00233   s[i] = '\0';
00234   reverse(s);
00235 }

00237 /* \brief Conversion int -> std::string */
00243 std::string IntToString(int intValue) {
00244   char *myBuff;
00245   std::string strRetVal;
00246   myBuff = new char[100];
00247   memset(myBuff,'\0',100);
00248 
00249   itoa(intValue,myBuff);
00250 
00251   strRetVal = myBuff;
00252   delete[] myBuff;
00253   return(strRetVal);
00254 }

00256 /* \brief returns folder position */
00262 std::string Folder(std::string where){
00263   std::string folder_amd="/data/achtland1/psteger/amd/";
00264   std::string folder_snaps = folder_amd+"snap/";
00265   std::string folder_amateur = folder_amd+"amateur/";
00266   std::string folder_output = folder_amd+"output/";
00267   std::string folder_parameters = folder_output + "parameters/";
00268   if(where=="amd")
00269     return folder_amd;
00270   else if(where=="snaps")
00271     return folder_snaps;
00272   else if(where=="amateur")
00273     return folder_amateur;
00274   else if(where=="output")
00275     return folder_output;
00276   else if(where=="parameters")
00277     return folder_parameters;
00278   else
00279     {
00280       std::cout << "Folder " << where << " not found, returning folder of amd!";
00281       return folder_amd;
00282     }
00283 }

00318 real
00319 fbmod( real x, real m ){
00320   return x - floor( x/m + 0.5 )*m;
00321 }
00322 
00323 template< typename real_t >
00324 real_t
00325 SPHK3D( const real_t r, const real_t h ){
00326   const real_t xi(r/h);
00327   const real_t norm(8.0/PI/(h*h*h));
00328 
00329   if( xi<0.5 ){
00330     return norm*(6.0*xi*xi*(xi-1.0)+1.0);
00331   } else {
00332     if( xi <= 1.0 ){
00333       real_t t(1.0-xi);
00334       return norm*2.0*t*t*t;
00335     }
00336     return 0.0;
00337   }
00338 }
